extension.summary: Launches LaunchBox in Big Box mode from within PSMC.
extension.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the PSMC-20 Repository on GitHub.
extension.description: Launches Big Box from within PSMC - It will close or minimize PSMC and when Big Box is exited, PSMC will restart or maximize. Also has options to run programs pre or post BigBox.
